name: Chad Ravioli's Slammin' Slurp-rise
description:
Chad Ravioli, internationally-renowned celebrichef known for his Foodie Network show "Drivers, Diners, and Dimes" and his line of Chad Ravioli-brand Chaddysnax® appears in his first ever video game: Chad Ravioli's Slammin' Slurp-rise! Pull down the lever on the Slurpatron Automat, then choose three key flavors and ingredients to make a uniquely slamma-jamma-tastic dish. This game is truly OFF THE HOOK, Y'ALL.

This is a 30-seconds-or-less, head-to-head, two-player game made for the Fantastic Arcade BARFCADE game jam. Player 1 controls: WASD+Space. Player 2 controls: ↑←↓→+Enter.
